app module¶

Patient medication management¶

RESTful API that manages patients medication using Flask-SQLAlchemy and PostgreSQL.

app.add_medication(patient_id)¶

Method to add a new medication to the database. Method = POST

Json request parameters: * description (string) * dosage (int) * unit (enum) * time (‘HH:MM:SS’) * creationDate (‘YYYY-MM-DD’) * modifyDate (will be automated)

! unit is an enum type: kg, g, mg,mcg, l, ml, cc, mol, mmol arguments accepted.

Parameters

patient_id – ID of the patient that you want to add medicine to.

Returns

if the medication is added- a successful message

app.add_patient()¶

Method to add a new patient to the database. Metod = POST

Json request parameters: * firstName (string) * lastName (string) * description (string) * gender (enum) * dateOfBirth (‘YYYY-MM-DD’) * modifyDate (will be automated)

! gender is an enum type: male, female or unknown arguments accepted.

Returns

if the patient is added- a successful message

app.delete_medication(medication_id)¶

Deletes a medication based on its ID. Method = DELETE

Parameters

medication_id – The ID of the medication you want to delete.

Returns

If the medication is deleted- a successful message.

app.delete_patient(patient_id)¶

Deletes a patient based on his ID. Method = DELETE

Parameters

patient_id – The ID of the patient you want to delete.

Returns

If the patient is deleted- a successful message.

app.get_medication(medication_id)¶

Return data about a specific medication.

Parameters

medication_id – The medications’ database ID.

Returns

A json object that contains the medications’ description, dosage and unit.

app.get_medications()¶

Returns all the medications from the database.

Returns

List containing the medications. It outputs medications’ description, dosage and unit.

app.get_patient(patient_id)¶

Returns data about a specific patient.

Parameters

patient_id – The patients’ database ID.

Returns

A json object that contains patient’s first name, last name and a short description.

app.get_patients()¶

Returns all the patients from the database.

Returns

List containing the patients. It outputs patients’ first name, last name and a short description.

app.index()¶
app.update_medication(medication_id)¶

Updates data about a specific medication. Method = PUT

Json request parameters:

  • description (string)

  • dosage (int)

  • unit (enum)

  • time (‘HH:MM:SS’)

  • creationDate (‘YYYY-MM-DD’)

  • modifyDate (will be automated)

! unit is an enum type: kg, g, mg,mcg, l, ml, cc, mol, mmol arguments accepted.

Parameters

medication_id – The ID of the medication you want to update.

Returns

If the medication is updated- a successful message.

app.update_patient(patient_id)¶

Updates data about a specific patient. Method = PUT

Available Json request parameters: * firstName (string) * lastName (string) * description (string) * gender (enum) * dateOfBirth (‘YYYY-MM-DD’) * modifyDate (will be automated)

! gender is an enum type: male, female or unknown arguments accepted.

Parameters

patient_id – The ID of the patient you want to delete.

Returns

If the patient is updated- a successful message.
